description: Kubernetes Cluster Overview - provides insignts into k8s health and its objects, including Percona Custom Resources

panels.description: The total number of nodes that are not in Ready state
panels.title: Not Ready Nodes

panels.description: The total number of Pods in the cluster
panels.title: Total Pods

panels.description: The total number of Pods not in the Running Status
panels.title: Not Running Pods

panels.description: Total CPU (cores) capacity of the Kubernetes cluster
panels.title: CPU capacity

panels.description: How many CPU cores were requested by Containers
panels.title: CPU requests

panels.description: Percentage showing the requested CPU cores or used CPU cluster capacity
panels.title: CPU requests %

panels.description: The sum of CPU (cores) limits for all containers in the cluster
panels.title: CPU limits

panels.description: The number of Percona Clusters (Custom Resources) deployed in the cluster
panels.title: Percona Clusters

panels.description: The number of Percona Clusters (Custom Resources) deployed in the cluster that are not in Ready state
panels.title: Percona Clusters not Ready

panels.description: Total Memory (RAM) capacity of the Kubernetes cluster
panels.title: Memory capacity

panels.description: How many Memory (RAM) bytes were requested by Containers
panels.title: Memory requests

panels.description: Percentage showing the requested Memory or used Memory cluster capacity
panels.title: Memory requests %

panels.description: The sum of Memory (RAM) bytes limits set for containers
panels.title: Memory limits

panels.description: The health of Percona Custom Resources (CRs) for Clusters - PXC, Percona Server for MongoDB, Percona Distribution for PostgreSQL
panels.title: Percona Custom Resources - Clusters

panels.description: The table that lists Percona Custom Resources - Clusters

defaults.noValue: No databases on this Kubernetes cluster

panels.title: Percona Custom Resources - Clusters

panels.description: The health of Percona Custom Resources (CRs) for Backups - pxc-backup, psmdb-backup, pg-backup
panels.title: Percona Custom Resources - Backups

panels.description: The table that lists Percona Custom Resources - Backups

defaults.noValue: No backups were created for databases

panels.title: Percona Custom Resources - Backups

panels.description: CPU and Memory requests and limits utilization for the whole Kubernetes cluster
panels.title: CPU and Memory %

title: Kubernetes Cluster Overview
